survey_name: Workplace Noise Levels and Productivity Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand employee perceptions of workplace noise and its impact on productivity and well-being.

questions.question_text: How would you describe the noise level in your primary workspace?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistent measurement. Ensure options are balanced.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio button (single-choice). Randomize options to avoid bias.

script.question_text: How would you describe the noise level in your primary workspace?

questions.question_text: Which of the following noise sources are present in your workspace? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for unique responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Checkbox (multi-choice). Include an open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which of the following noise sources are present in your workspace? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How often do you use noise-canceling headphones or other tools to reduce noise?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point frequency scale. Clarify 'tools' in the question if needed.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio button (single-choice). Ensure mobile-friendly layout.

script.question_text: How often do you use noise-canceling headphones or other tools to reduce noise?

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 10, how much does workplace noise affect your productivity? (1 = Not at all, 10 = Extremely)
questions.client_notes: Use a numeric scale for precise measurement. Include clear anchors.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio button (single-choice). Display scale horizontally if space allows.

script.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 10, how much does workplace noise affect your productivity? (1 = Not at all, 10 = Extremely)

questions.question_text: What type of workspace do you primarily work in?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option for flexibility. Ensure options cover common workspace types.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio button (single-choice). Include an open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What type of workspace do you primarily work in?

questions.question_text: Have you ever requested a change to your workspace due to noise levels?
questions.client_notes: Use a simple yes/no format. Follow up with Q7 if 'Yes' is selected.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio button (single-choice). Route to Q7 if 'Yes' is selected.

script.question_text: Have you ever requested a change to your workspace due to noise levels?

questions.question_text: What was the outcome of your request for a workspace change due to noise?
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q6 is answered with 'Yes'
questions.client_notes: Use clear, mutually exclusive options. Add a 'Still pending' option for unresolved requests.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio button (single-choice). Only show if Q6 = 'Yes'.

script.question_text: What was the outcome of your request for a workspace change due to noise?
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q6 is answered with 'Yes'

questions.question_text: What strategies do you use to cope with workplace noise?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture unique coping mechanisms. Limit response length to 200 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Open text. Set character limit to 200.

script.question_text: What strategies do you use to cope with workplace noise?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your organization's efforts to manage workplace noise?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point satisfaction scale. Ensure options are balanced.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio button (single-choice). Randomize options to avoid bias.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your organization's efforts to manage workplace noise?

questions.question_text: What additional measures would you suggest to improve noise management in your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather actionable suggestions. Limit response length to 300 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Open text. Set character limit to 300.

script.question_text: What additional measures would you suggest to improve noise management in your workplace?
